item.title: Adlabs Imagica: A bitter sweet experience
item.description: Adlabs Imagica is a serenic place in outskirts of Mumbai with lots of activities to do. One can go for a weekend getaway and enjoy the destination’s offerings i.e. Theme park, Water park, Snow park, etc.It does give the thrill and a sense of adventure to its visitors.Various attrations at the theme park include the rides namely Nitro, Scream Machine, Dare 2 Drop, etc. I had been to Imagica’s theme park last weekend with friends and siblings.
